input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Adam: Hey, Frank. I heard you got a new job.
Daniel: Yeah, Judy. I will be working for the Post Office. It's not a bad job.
Adam: Is it true that you have a heavy work schedule?
Daniel: That's right. I am supposed to work at 5am everyday, and I only get 45 minutes for lunch.
Adam: So, why did you apply for such a demanding job?
Daniel: Well, the government offers its employees excellent health insurance benefits.
Adam: Oh, I see. And can your family members utilize the health insurance, too?
Daniel: Yeah, that's the best part. All of my children can get free medical care.
Adam: That's a great employment benefit!
Daniel: Now you know why I wanted to work for the Post Office!

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Frank got a new job with a demanding work schedule. Frank has to work at 5am everyday and only get 45 minutes for lunch. Frank's children are eligible for the government's health insurance.
input_text.Response B: Adam congratulates Frank on his new job and asks why Frank wants to work for the Post Office. Frank tells Adam the Post Office offers excellent health insurance benefits for both him and his family.

label_annotations.factors_a: I found this one hard to judge, due to the confusing naming convention used in the prompt (is it Adam and Daniel, or Frank and Judy?); I therefore went for middle ratings on nearly everything.
label_annotations.factors_b: I found this one hard to judge, due to the confusing naming convention used in the prompt (is it Adam and Daniel, or Frank and Judy?); I therefore went for middle ratings on nearly everything.
